$description:
| What does this do? | Enables the admin consent workflow and blocks user consent for risky apps. |
| Why should you use this? | Ensures proper governance controls for managing applications access to organizational data are in place. |
| What is the end-user impact? | Users will need to use organizationally approved methods to provision new third-party applications. |
| Learn more | [Admin consent workflow](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/active-directory/manage-apps/configure-admin-consent-workflow) |
